sentences.sContent: Toad, who was on the sofa by this time, with his legs up, rolled over on his face, shaken by sobs of contrition.
sentences.sContent_eng: Toad, who was on the sofa by this time, with his legs up, rolled over on his face, shaken by sobs of contrition.
sentences.sCn: 蟾蜍正翘腿倚在沙发上，听到这话，侧身掩面，全身抖动，痛悔地抽泣起来。

words.tran: 悔悟了的；后悔的；悔罪的
